HOME.TITLE: OpenVeo home page
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Use menu to access the different pages of the administration

APPLICATIONS.TITLE: Web Service applications
APPLICATIONS.INFO: An application lets you grant access to the OpenVeo web service for a specific client application. Create an application, attribute access to some web service end points and issue to the client application owner, the generated client id and client secret.
APPLICATIONS.FORM_ADD_SCOPES_DESC: List of permissions for the client application
